Uses of Class
com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.tomcat.TomcatServiceBuilder

  • Packages that use TomcatServiceBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.tomcat
    Embedded Tomcat service.

    • Uses of TomcatServiceBuilder in com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.tomcat

      Methods in com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.tomcat that return TomcatServiceBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TomcatServiceBuilder TomcatServiceBuilder.baseDir(Path baseDir)
      Sets the base directory of an embedded Tomcat.
      TomcatServiceBuilder TomcatServiceBuilder.baseDir(String baseDir)
      Sets the base directory of an embedded Tomcat.
      TomcatServiceBuilder TomcatServiceBuilder.configurator(Consumer<? super org.apache.catalina.core.StandardServer> configurator)
      Adds a Consumer that performs additional configuration operations against the Tomcat StandardServer created by a TomcatService.
      TomcatServiceBuilder TomcatServiceBuilder.engineName(String engineName)
      Sets the name of the StandardEngine of an embedded Tomcat.
      static TomcatServiceBuilder TomcatServiceBuilder.forClassPath(Class<?> clazz)
      Creates a new TomcatServiceBuilder with the web application at the root directory inside the JAR/WAR/directory where the specified class is located at.
      static TomcatServiceBuilder TomcatServiceBuilder.forClassPath(Class<?> clazz, String docBaseOrJarRoot)
      Creates a new TomcatServiceBuilder with the web application at the specified document base directory inside the JAR/WAR/directory where the specified class is located at.
      static TomcatServiceBuilder TomcatServiceBuilder.forCurrentClassPath()
      Creates a new TomcatServiceBuilder with the web application at the root directory inside the JAR/WAR/directory where the caller class is located at.
      static TomcatServiceBuilder TomcatServiceBuilder.forCurrentClassPath(String docBase)
      Creates a new TomcatServiceBuilder with the web application at the specified document base directory inside the JAR/WAR/directory where the caller class is located at.
      static TomcatServiceBuilder TomcatServiceBuilder.forFileSystem(Path docBase)
      Creates a new TomcatServiceBuilder with the web application at the specified document base, which can be a directory or a JAR/WAR file.
      static TomcatServiceBuilder TomcatServiceBuilder.forFileSystem(String docBase)
      Creates a new TomcatServiceBuilder with the web application at the specified document base, which can be a directory or a JAR/WAR file.
      TomcatServiceBuilder TomcatServiceBuilder.hostname(String hostname)
      Sets the hostname of an embedded Tomcat.
      TomcatServiceBuilder TomcatServiceBuilder.realm(org.apache.catalina.Realm realm)
      Sets the Realm of an embedded Tomcat.
      TomcatServiceBuilder TomcatServiceBuilder.serviceName(String serviceName)
      Sets the name of the StandardService of an embedded Tomcat.
